commands.tradefinder.start.not-selected: You have not selected a librarian and lectern. Use '/tradefinder select' or keybinding to select the lectern and librarian.
commands.tradefinder.start.success-singl: Started searching for %d for at most %d emeralds.
commands.tradefinder.search.no-enchantme: You need to select at least one enchantment to search for.
commands.tradefinder.select.not-looking-: You are not looking at a lectern.
librarian-trade-finder.check.interact.fa: Failed to interact with villager. Try again.
librarian-trade-finder.break.axe.breakin: The searching process was stopped because your axe is about to break.
librarian-trade-finder.found: Found enchantment %d for %d emeralds after %d attempts!
tradefinderui.screen.title: Librarian Trade Finder
tradefinderui.options.title: Options
tradefinderui.options.tp-to-villager.too: Teleports you to the villager when the lectern is broken to try to pickup the lecterns dropped there.
Stops the search process if your axe is about to break.
tradefinderui.options.legit-mode.tooltip: When enabled automatically look at the lectern or villager to prevent getting flagged by some anti cheats.
tradefinderui.options.slow-mode.tooltip: When enabled, the search process is slowed down to make the modification fairer and look more legitimate.
tradefinderui.reset.tooltip: Reset all enchantments to default values
tradefinderui.enchantments.title: Enchantments
tradefinderui.enchantments.price.tooltip: Set the maximum price for this enchantment.
tradefinderui.enchantments.level.tooltip: Set the level for this enchantment.
tradefinderui.enchantments.price.name: Max Price
tradefinderui.enchantments.level.name: Level
